languages.text: {n}Тервантьяс презрительно ухмыляется.{/n} "Ты так простодуш{mf|ен|на}, мон-кай. Неужели твой слабый ум измыслил иллюзию, будто меня можно умилостивить банальной демонстрацией покорности? Тебе стоит находиться на коленях все время, что ты подле меня. Теперь поди прочь".

{n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."
languages.original_text: {n}Тервантьяс презрительно ухмыляется.{/n} "Ты так простодуш{mf|ен|на}, мон-кай. Неужели твой слабый ум измыслил иллюзию, будто меня можно умилостивить банальной демонстрацией покорности? Тебе стоит находиться на коленях все время, что ты подле меня. Теперь поди прочь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be standing on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

{n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be standing on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

{n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

{n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは嘲笑を浮かべる。{/n}「モン＝ケイよ、お前は実に世を知らぬ。そのような使い古された服従の所作で、私が本当に納得すると思っているのか？私の前に立つ時は、常に跪くべきなのだ。今すぐ私の視界から消えよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは嘲笑を浮かべる。{/n}「モン＝ケイよ、お前は実に世を知らぬ。そのような使い古された服従の所作で、私が本当に納得すると思っているのか？私の前に立つ時は、常に跪くべきなのだ。今すぐ私の視界から消えよ」

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯嘲弄地笑了起来。{/n}“你太天真了，猴子。莫非你那无能的头脑认为，你这种毫无新意的漂亮话能哄得了我吗？无论什么时候，你见到我都应该跪下。好了，赶紧从我面前消失吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯嘲弄地笑了起来。{/n}“你太天真了，猴子。莫非你那无能的头脑认为，你这种毫无新意的漂亮话能哄得了我吗？无论什么时候，你见到我都应该跪下。好了，赶紧从我面前消失吧。”

languages.text: {n}Tervantias répond avec un sourire moqueur,{/n} « Quelle naïveté, mon-keigh... Avez-vous laissé votre pathétique esprit vous convaincre qu'une telle démonstration d'obéissance suffirait à m'apaiser ? Vous devriez être à genoux en ma présence. Maintenant, hors de ma vue ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias répond avec un sourire moqueur,{/n} « Quelle naïveté, mon-keigh... Avez-vous laissé votre pathétique esprit vous convaincre qu'une telle démonstration d'obéissance suffirait à m'apaiser ? Vous devriez être à genoux en ma présence. Maintenant, hors de ma vue ! »

languages.text: {n}Tervantias responde con una sonrisa de desdén.{/n} «Qué ingenu{mf|o|a}, mon-keigh. ¿Acaso tu impotente mente te ha convencido de que me apaciguarías con tan manida demostración de obediencia? Deberías estar de rodillas siempre que estés en mi presencia. Y ahora lárgate».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias responde con una sonrisa de desdén.{/n} «Qué ingenu{mf|o|a}, mon-keigh. ¿Acaso tu impotente mente te ha convencido de que me apaciguarías con tan manida demostración de obediencia? Deberías estar de rodillas siempre que estés en mi presencia. Y ahora lárgate».

languages.text: {n}Tervantias entgegnet mit einem spöttischen Lächeln:{/n} "Ihr seid so naiv, Chem-Pan-Sey. Hat Euch Euer ohnmächtiger Verstand überzeugt, dass ich durch eine so triste Demonstration von Gehorsam besänftigt werden könnte? Auf den Knien solltet Ihr in meiner Gegenwart rutschen. Und jetzt geht mir aus den Augen."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias entgegnet mit einem spöttischen Lächeln:{/n} "Ihr seid so naiv, Chem-Pan-Sey. Hat Euch Euer ohnmächtiger Verstand überzeugt, dass ich durch eine so triste Demonstration von Gehorsam besänftigt werden könnte? Auf den Knien solltet Ihr in meiner Gegenwart rutschen. Und jetzt geht mir aus den Augen."

languages.text: {n}Tervantias, alaycı bir gülümsemeyle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Çok naifsin mon-keigh. O bayağı zihninle böylesine banal bir itaat gösterisinden hoşnut kalacağımı mı düşündün? Esasında her huzuruma çıktığında dizlerinin üstüne çökmelisin. Şimdi yıkıl karşımdan."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias responds with a derisive smile,{/n} "You are so naive, mon-keigh. Have you been convinced by your impotent mind that I could be appeased by such a trite demonstration of obedience? You should be on your knees whenever you are in my presence. Now get out of my sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias alaycı bir gülümsemeyle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Çok naifsin mon-keigh. O bayağı zihninle böylesine banal bir itaat gösterisinden hoşnut kalacağımı mı düşündün? Zaten her huzuruma çıktığında dizlerinin üstüne çökmelisin. Şimdi yıkıl karşımdan."
